resources.string: Skype name for the tablet is: %1$s \n Email is %1$s @gmail.com \n Password for both of the accounts is botanical12
Hello, Welcome to the Digital Community Visitors Service, the goal of the program is to improve social health and well being through use of Technology

The reason %1$s tablet was given to you, is to help facilitate communication between you and other people, \n whether that is the volunteers in the program or other people you might want to talk to \n there is a limit of 3GB on your mobile data and if you use more then that then you will need to wait till the 26th of the month for the reset to happen
DCVS Office: Phone Number, Email \n DCVS - Help Desk: Phone Number, Email \n NAC: Phone Number, Email, Address
